import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react'; import TextareaAutosize from "react-textarea-autosize"; import axios from "axios"; const StageElem = () => { const [type,setType]=useState([]) const [tags,setTags]=useState([]) const [photo, setPhoto]=useState("") const [msg, setMsg]=useState("") useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:8000/type/').then((res)=>setType(res.data)) axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:8000/tags/').then((res)=>setTags(res.data)) console.log(type) }, []); const onFileChange = (event) => { setPhoto(event.target.files[0]) } const uploadFileData = (event) => { setMsg("") const data = new FormData(); data.append('file', photo); axios.post('http://localhost:8000/img/upload', data).then((res) => { setMsg("Фото загружено") setPhoto(res.data.filename.filename) } ) } return (
{photo!=="" ? :null}

{msg}

); }; export default StageElem;
